@dev Constructor
     The deploying account becomes contractOwner

nodes.name: requireIsOperational

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier that requires the "ContractOwner" account to be the function caller
nodes.name: requireContractOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Get operating status of contract
    * @return A bool that is the current operating status
nodes.name: isOperational

nodes.documentation:
@dev Sets contract operations on/off
    * When operational mode is disabled, all write transactions except for this one will fail
nodes.name: setOperatingStatus

nodes.documentation:
@dev Add an airline to the registration queue
     Can only be called from FlightSuretyApp contract
nodes.name: registerAirline

nodes.documentation: @dev Buy insurance for a flight
nodes.name: buy

nodes.documentation: @dev Credits payouts to insurees
nodes.name: creditInsurees

nodes.documentation: @dev Transfers eligible payout funds to insuree
nodes.name: pay

nodes.documentation:
@dev Initial funding for the insurance. Unless there are too many delayed flights
     resulting in insurance payouts, the contract should be self-sustaining
nodes.name: fund

nodes.documentation: @dev Fallback function for funding smart contract.

constructor.details: Constructor     The deploying account becomes contractOwner

fund().details: Initial funding for the insurance. Unless there are too many delayed flights     resulting in insurance payouts, the contract should be self-sustaining

isOperational().return: A bool that is the current operating status

pay().details: Transfers eligible payout funds to insuree

registerAirline().details: Add an airline to the registration queue     Can only be called from FlightSuretyApp contract

setOperatingStatus(bool).details: Sets contract operations on/off    * When operational mode is disabled, all write transactions except for this one will fail
